keyword: how many calories is in sweet tea
title: How Many Calories Are in Sweet Tea?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in sweet tea per 8 oz serving, including carbs from sugar, sodium, and tips for lower-calorie versions.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Sweet Tea?
assumptions: Standard iced sweet tea (Southern-style), brewed black tea with added white sugar, no lemon or other flavors; 8 oz (240 ml) serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, sugar amount, tea strength, and preparation; homemade vs. bottled differs. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 8 oz serving of sweet tea contains about 86 calories, primarily from 22 g of sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: With diet sweetener (e.g., stevia instead of sugar)

faqs.q: How many calories is in sweet tea per serving?
faqs.a: About 86 calories in an 8 oz serving of standard sweet tea.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in sweet tea?
faqs.a: Yes, around 22 g of carbs per 8 oz, all from added sugars; no fiber.

faqs.q: How does bottled sweet tea compare to homemade?
faqs.a: Bottled versions vary but often have 90-120 kcal per 8 oz due to added preservatives and varying sugar.

faqs.q: Can I make low-calorie sweet tea?
faqs.a: Yes, use zero-calorie sweeteners like Splenda or stevia to drop calories to nearly 0 while keeping it sweet.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in sweet tea?
faqs.a: Typically 22 g of sugars per 8 oz serving, equivalent to about 5-6 teaspoons.
